column2: "/ci1 5 How nice of you to show up. I'd really appreciate some help fighting here."
"/ci1 1 Alright, all done. Thanks. I'm gonna get back to my patrol."
"/ci1 2 Uh oh, I should probably get out of here."

"/ci1 5 やあ、キミか。
ちょっと手伝ってもらえないかな？"

"/ci1 1 ありがとう！
おかげで、いい戦闘データが取れたよ。"
"/ci1 2 うーん、今回はここまでか……。"
